post.summary: Initiate document processing to extract text and run inference to extract utility information.

schema.title: Organization
schema.description: Name of your organization. You can find your organization in the Tractatus AI web app under Settings.

schema.title: Endpoint Id
schema.description: Unique endpoint ID used to select a specific prompt template, model and configs used to extract information from the document during inference time. You can generate your own `endpoint_id` in the Tractatus AI platform. Enterprise customers may have `endpoint_id` provided to them by Tractatus AI.

schema.title: Tractatus API Key
schema.description: API Key used for authentication, provided by Tractatus AI

get.summary: Get Document Inference Status and Result

schema.title: Organization
schema.description: Name of your organization. You can find your organization in the Tractatus AI web app under Settings.

schema.title: Endpoint Id
schema.description: Unique endpoint ID used to select a specific Deploy Endpoint. This ID should match the original `endpoint_id` provided in the Inference Start request.

schema.title: Request Id
schema.description: Unique request ID that was returned in the original Start Inference request under the `id` property of the JSON response.

schema.title: Tractatus API Key
schema.description: API Key used for authentication, provided by Tractatus AI.

Context.title: Context
Context.description: Container for any context (external data sources) on which the LLM will run the inference query.

file_urls.title: File Urls
file_urls.description: List of file URLs that will be downloaded, processed (OCR) and indexed for inference.

id.title: Id
id.description: This is the request ID that must be passed into the Query Result API endpoint.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO Timestamp at which the Start Inference request was received.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the document processing/inference request. Options are: NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, PROCESSING_DOCUMENT, INFERENCE_IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, ERROR.

message.title: Message
message.description: Descriptive message provide more details into the current status or error condition.

document_set_id.title: Document Set Id
document_set_id.description: Unique ID that identifies the provided documents in the context. For reference only.

id.title: Id
id.description: Request ID that was passed in as a query parameter. For reference only.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO Timestamp at which the Start Inference request was received.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the document processing/inference request. Options are: NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, PROCESSING_DOCUMENT, INFERENCE_IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, ERROR.

message.title: Message
message.description: Descriptive message provide more details into the current status or error condition.

document_set_id.title: Document Set Id
document_set_id.description: Unique ID that identifies the provided documents in the context. For reference only.

inference_id.title: Inference Id
inference_id.description: Unique ID for the inference that was executed. For reference only.

output.title: Output
output.description: Final output that contains the information extracted from the input context document. The format is specific to the use case, but the default is JSON format.

loc.title: Location
loc.description: Location in the request where the validation error occurred, e.g. `body`, `header`, `path`.

msg.title: Message
msg.description: Description of the validation error that occurred.

type.title: Error Type
type.description: Type of validation error that occurred, e.g. `type_error`, `value_error`, etc.
